attributes.action: Abolish the maths gcse it’s to hard many people failed because of it
attributes.background: The maths gcse puts many children through undeniable stress and sucks the souls out of every child in every house from every creed/background

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
